import React from "react"; import image from "../assets/images/upload-video-preview.jpg"; function Upload(props) { const publishClick = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(event.target.form); let uploadedVideo = { title: event.target.form.videoTitle.value, channel: `Mega Mohan`, description: event.target.form.videoDescription, image: "https://i.imgur.com/GLUMomv.jpg" }; console.log(uploadedVideo); }; return (

); } export default Upload;
